amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for operation, renovation, or construction at Thomson Correctional Facility in Illinois.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for operation, renovation, or construction at Thomson Correctional Facility in Illinois.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 208 (Roll no. 256).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 208 (Roll no. 256).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A055) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
